description: Marine Headquarters and the execution site for Portgas D. Ace, serving as the battlefield for the Summit War between the Marines and Whitebeard Pirates.

keyEvents.title: Hancock Gives Luffy the Key to Ace's Handcuffs
keyEvents.description: On the Marineford battlefield, Hancock provides Luffy with the key to free Ace from his restraints.
keyEvents.significance: Provides Luffy with a crucial tool for the rescue mission.

keyEvents.title: Doflamingo Reveals Kuma's Complete Transformation
keyEvents.description: On the battlefield, Doflamingo explains to Ivankov that Kuma has been completely transformed by Vegapunk.
keyEvents.significance: Major revelation about the Pacifista project occurring at Marineford.

keyEvents.title: Ivankov Fights Kuma
keyEvents.description: Ivankov engages Kuma in battle on the Marineford battlefield, attempting to restore his memories.
keyEvents.significance: A major confrontation between former Revolutionary Army comrades.

keyEvents.title: Mihawk Blocks Luffy's Path
keyEvents.description: Mihawk positions himself in Luffy's way as he advances across the battlefield toward Ace's execution platform.
keyEvents.significance: Creates a critical obstacle for Luffy's rescue mission.

statusHistory.reason: Active battlefield during the Summit War
